description: In the same way that https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1489531 was for changing the disk format, we should also have an enum for container format so we can control that a little better.
title: There should be a nova.objects.fields.ContainerFormatEnum for the ImageMeta.container_format field

comments.content: In the same way that https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1489531 was for changing the disk format, we should also have an enum for container format so we can control that a little better.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rlrossit

comments.content:
This bug report doesn't describe a failure in the behavior of Nova.
It's a personal todo item which doesn't need the overhead of a bug
report. Because of this, I'm closing this report as invalid. This
shouldn't stop you though to do your item and push it as a review.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
